data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pilato, Giovanni, Mcinnes, Sandra J., Lisi, Oscar (2012): Hebesuncus mollispinus (Eutardigrada, Hypsibiidae), a new species from maritime Antarctica. Zootaxa 3446: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213704
